text: is a Japanese city in Akita Prefecture on the island of Honshu.Alt, Matt et al. (2012). Frommer's Japan Day by Day, p. 401. ==History== In 2005, the city was created by the merger of the towns of Tennō, Iitagawa and Shōwa. ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.city.katagami.akita.jp/ Category:Cities in Akita Prefecture
title: Katagami, Akita
